snippet.title: Predators' prospect Pickard a goalie on the rise
snippet.description: . If you want to see cool personified, you could watch Pickard, who just turned 20, skate into his crease. Or, you could catch him on one of his many community appearances reading to local school children. A recent visit had him reading "Dino-Hockey" to first-graders, a book that featured several tricky dinosaur names. Pickard handled it like he was making an uncontested outlet pass. "I have fun with it...
